content: yarn a and 8mm hook notes the turning chain does not count as a stitch unless indicated be sure to read the pattern all the way through before beginning - pattern begin waistband with 8mm hook and thick yarn a chain 7 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain and in each chain across chain 1and turn row 2 work single_crochet in each stitch across chain 1 and turn repeat row 2 as follows work a total of 72 row for 33-inch 80 row for size 36-inch and 88 row for 39-inch if you would like to make it larger or smaller make sure the total number of row can be divided evenly by 8 at the same time on every 6th and 8th row work a button hole row as follows single_crochet in each of first 2 sts chain 2 skip 2 sts single_crochet in each of last 2 sts ch1 and turn work single_crochet across the next row working 2 single_crochet in the chain-2 space after final row slip_stitch edges together to form a loop and turn right side out slip_stitch edge goes inside turn work to long edge chain 1 and work one single_crochet stitch per row along one side the total number of single_crochet must equal your number of row for the lace pattern to work so be sure and check skirt body round 1 continuing with 8mm hook ch1 and sc1 in same space *ch3 skip 3 single_crochet 1dc ch3 1dc in next single_crochet chain 3 skip 3 single_crochet** 1sc in next single_crochet* repeat * to *around ending the last repeat at ** ch3 sl st in first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 4 counts as a treble_crochet * skip the first chain-3 space work 1tr ch3 four times in the next chain-3 space work 1 treble_crochet in the same chain-3 space skip next chain-3 space** and treble_crochet into single_crochet st* repeat * to * around ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into top of chain 4 to join round 3 chain 1 and single_crochet in same space * chain 4 skip next chain-3 space single_crochet in next chain-3 space ch3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 4 skip next chain-3 space** single_crochet in treble_crochet st * repeat * to * across ending last repeat at ** slip_stitch into first single_crochet to join round 4 chain 3 counts as double_crochet * chain 3 skip chain-4 space work 1dc chain 3 1dc in next chain-3 space chain 3 skip chain-4 space ** double_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat * to * around ending the last repeat at ** slip_stitch into top of chain 3 to join repeat rounds 2-4 to continue skirt body at the same time on every 5th round change hook size to 1mm larger beginning with round 5 round 5 = 9mm hook round 10 = 10mm hook round 15 = 11mm hook skirt as shown is 15
